changes.change: Increased stability when installing ringtones. Ringtone installer now have multiple fallbacks if installation fails.
App will question ToneLibrary for missing identifiers on app load
Added automatic file conversion to m4r
Ringtones longer than 30 seconds will now be shortened to the first 30 seconds of the sound file
Added send email button in settings that includes current settings, imported ringtones and important device info
Fixed bug where app would not load anything
Implemented applist for adding extra apps to scan
Added "Delete all" functionality in advanced settings
Added code to handle "open in" calls from other apps
